**Title**
Professional Services in Geotechnical Engineering
===========================

[NCC Logo]
National Capital Commission
[Image of Steamroller Logo]
Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
===============

Document ID: PW-22-01005665 (Ref. # SS006)

Summary
--------

The National Capital Commission (NCC) invites proponents to submit their proposals for providing Professional Services in Geotechnical Engineering under a Standing Offer Agreement (SOA). The services will be required on an "as and when requested" basis for a period of four years, with a maximum of six (6) SOAs to be awarded.

**Objectives**
---------------

The NCC aims to appoint consulting engineering firms to provide professional services for geotechnical engineering on a standing offer basis. The services will be required at various locations within the National Capital Region, including Ontario and Quebec provinces.

**Project Requirements**
-------------------------

*   Conduct or participate in geotechnical studies and investigations as required.
*   Prepare and review geotechnical designs and reports as required.
*   Engage in field investigations, including soil and rock sampling, if required.
*   Participate in laboratory testing and analysis, as required.
*   Perform other tasks as requested by the NCC.

**Standing Offer Agreement (SOA)**
-----------------------------------

The NCC intends to award a maximum of six (6) SOAs. Each SOA will be in effect for a period of four years from the date of award or until the total expenditure level is attained, whichever comes first. The SOAs will serve as the contractual instrument against which individual call-ups can be made.

**Notice and Enquiry**
-------------------------

Enquiries regarding this Request for Standing Offer must be submitted in writing by e-mail to Stacy Semé, Senior Contract Officer, at [stacy.seme@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:stacy.seme@ncc-ccn.ca) within fourteen (14) calendar days prior to the date set for solicitation closing.

**Bidding Information**
-------------------------

*   BID DEADLINE: September 29, 2022, at 3:00 PM (Return to: National Capital Commission, Defence Construction Canada, 305 Orleans Street, Ottawa, ON K1L 7G8)
*   All questions and other communications should be directed to Stacy Semé at [stacy.seme@ncc-ccn.ca](mailto:stacy.seme@ncc-ccn.ca). 
*   Please refer to the National Capital Commission
